long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an essential companion to the Boop app, designed to enhance your virtual meeting experience.

With Boop, you can take full control of your microphone, camera, and screen sharing with just a touch of a button. The synchronized LED indicator ensures that you're always aware of your status, allowing you to focus on the conversation without worrying about technical issues.

Currently, we support Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, and Cisco Webex for MacOS, and Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams for Windows.

To use this extension, you'll need to have a Boop device and the Boop software installed on your computer. If you don't have a Boop yet, you can purchase one here https://www.goboop.io/
